ERR10000.description: Incorrect signature or malformed token in authorization header

ERR10001.description: Jwt token in authorization header expired

ERR10002.description: No Authorization header or the token is not bearer type

ERR10003.description: Incorrect signature or malformed token in X-Scope-Token header

ERR10005.description: Scopes in authorization token and spec scopes are not matched

ERR10006.description: Scopes in scope token and spec scopes are not matched

ERR10007.description: Request path cannot be found in the spec.

ERR10008.description: Request method cannot be found in the spec.

ERR10009.description: Could not get client credentials token in client module
